debug.html

00001 <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd">
00002 <html><head>
00003 <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
00004 <title>Test - debug.js</title>
00005 <script type='text/javascript' src='../../wednus.js'></script>
00006 <script type='text/javascript'>
00007 // using debugging utilities
00008 W.module('debug');  // W.test, W.Timer, ...
00009 </script>
00010 
00011 
00012 <script type='text/javascript'>
00013 // check Timer
00014 var timer2 = new W.Timer();
00015 timer2.start();
00016 W.wait(1000);
00017 timer2.finish();
00018 
00019 // check pause/resume feature
00020 var timer3 = new W.Timer();
00021 timer3.start();
00022 timer3.pause();
00023 W.wait(1000);
00024 timer3.resume();
00025 timer3.finish();
00026 
00027 
00028 // check other features
00029 var timer = new W.Timer();
00030 timer.start();
00031 
00032 // test 'W.module('
00033 W.test(1 == '1', 'number vs. string');  // warnning
00034 W.test('abc' != 'abc  ', 'string vs. string w/ trailing space');
00035 
00036 {
00037     var a = function(){var a = 1;};
00038     var b = function(){var a=1;};
00039     var c = function(){var a = 1;};
00040     W.test(a != b, 'comparing function object - 1');
00041     W.test(a != c, 'comparing function object - 2');
00042     b = a;
00043     W.test(a == b, 'comparing function object - 3');
00044     b = null;
00045     W.test(a != null, 'comparing function object - 4');
00046     W.test(a != 'function () { var a = 1; }', 'comparing function object - 5');
00047     
00048     // test 'W.dumpobj'
00049     document.write(W.dumpobj(a));
00050     timer.pause();
00051     W.test('Click OK if you can see a table with property dumped.', 'W.dumpobj');
00052     timer.resume();
00053 }
00054 
00055 timer.pause();
00056 // test 'W.assert'
00057 alert('[TESTING ERROR-REPORTING]\n You will see an intended error message on next.');
00058 W.test(W.assert('a', 'ab', 'number vs. string') == false, 'W.assert');
00059 timer.resume();
00060 
00061 timer.finish();
00062 </script>
00063 </head>
00064 <body>
00065 </body>
00066 </html>
